attributes.action: Keep cervical smear tests at 3 years
attributes.additional_details: Many women and ladies have got/had cervical cancer. And too change it to 5 years instead of 3 years is very scary. To many of us women. What about the risk to our lives.
attributes.background: Make it law to not change cervical smear tests more than 3 years

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729981
